amendment.description: Amendment provides for expedited court review of certain alleged violations of the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 which occur in the last 90 days before an election.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to establish expedited court review of certain alleged violations of the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971.

action.text: Amendment (A034) offered by Mr. Shadegg to the Shays amendment (A002).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shadegg amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.
